p: ECG was recorder in lead DII (right forelimb to left hind limb) with a Biopac MP150 system. The apparatus was calibrated at 1 m V/1 cm with a speed of 50 mm/s. Heart rate (beats/min), RR intervals (msec), QT intervals (msec), and ST segment changes (mV) were measured. Corrected QT interval (QTc) according to Bazett formula was also calculated [ 55].
